author: Matthew Eifion Jones
description: A crowd pleasing cognac-based cocktail – will appeal to the many and upset few – with the monastic herbal complexity of Bénédictine with rich black raspberry, topped and effervesced with champagne.
name: B&B Royale
recipeIngredient: 45 ml Brut champagne or sparkling wine

recipeInstructions.text: STIR first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
